sentences.en: At the same time, the structural model of glass is diss - cussed.
sentences.cn: 同时探讨了玻璃的结构模型.

sentences.en: No, Tom, I won't be rich, and I won't live in them cussed smothery houses.
sentences.cn: 我不干, 汤姆, 我不要当富人, 也不想住在那闷热倒霉的房子里.

sentences.en: Problems concerning such a development, like high commercial value products - operative research are also dis - cussed.
sentences.cn: 提出发展精细化工产品是今后的方向,并讨论应注意的几个问题.

sentences.en: Several of methods are used for this evaluation and the effect of each methoddis - cussed.
sentences.cn: 重点阐述了各种方法的实现和应用效果.

sentences.en: She's so cussed she always does the opposite of what you ask.
sentences.cn: 她这人真是牛脾气,总是与你的要求背道而驰.

sentences.en: Taste preferences and their origin were dis - cussed.
sentences.cn: 我们讨论了味觉偏好和它们的由来.

sentences.en: The coach cussed out the team for losing the game.
sentences.cn: 教练由于队员输了把他们痛斥了一顿.

sentences.en: The coach cussed the team out for its poor showing.
sentences.cn: 教练因该队在比赛中的差劲表现而把队员们狠狠地训斥了一通.

sentences.en: The experiment results of a time - to - amplitude converter are given and linearity are dis cussed.
sentences.cn: 给出了实际时幅转换特性的试验数据及精度分析.

sentences.en: The kinetic regularity for subsidence of solid particles in non - Newtonian fluid was dis - cussed.
sentences.cn: 探讨固体颗粒在 非 牛顿液体中沉降的动力学规律.

sentences.en: The process of Pb metabolism and the perniciousness of Pb poisoning to children were dis - cussed.
sentences.cn: 论述了人体铅代谢过程及铅中毒对儿童的危害.

words.tran_cn: 固执的，顽固的；该诅咒的；乖僻的

trans.tran_cn: 乱骂，咒骂( cuss的过去式和过去分词 )
